titleStmt.title: Some reflections on some remarks upon a book, entituled Christ's lambs defended from Satan's rage; written in answer to a malicious book stiled The Quakers unmask'd.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
